text: The 2015 AMA National Speedway Championship Series was staged over four rounds, which were held at Costa Mesa (May 30),https://www.speedwaybikes.com/res2015_w/CostaMesa-150530.htm Ventura (June 27),https://www.speedwaybikes.com/res2015_w/Ventura-150627.htm Industry (August 8)https://www.speedwaybikes.com/res2015_w/Industry-150808.htm and Auburn (September 18).https://www.speedwaybikes.com/res2015_w/Auburn-150918.htm Billy Janniro took the title, his sixth in total, winning two of the four rounds. == Event format == Over the course of 20 heats, each rider raced against every other rider once. The top eight scorers then reached the semi-finals, with first and second in those semi-finals reaching the final.
